item.description:
$10 in advance, $15 at the door...

Gee will gladly honor the $10 for any active TOSOB STEPPER  who  attends

Gee request TOSOB STEPPERS let her  know how many so she can ensure a seat for those who attend

 

Watch the airport if you select Chicago O'Hare (ORD) Airport aprox 45 minutes away from venue

Midway Airport aprox 20 minutes away, many hotels are in this area and offer shuttle service from Airport

You may want to consider your GPS and a rental car

Air Fare mid week departure aprox $210 via Air Tran 1-866-683-8368  provide the following code: steppersball.com Monday - Friday 8a-9p

 

 

Southwest also a option

Share hotel and take a couple of classes or arrange privates

 EVENT LOCATION

Burbank Manor

6345 West 79th Street
Burbank, IL 60459-1133
(708) 599-2500
item.why: Donnie and Gee send a invitation to TOSOB This is a Chicago Event Donnie is George's Steppin Instructor Some of the TOSOB STEPPERS who attended The Steppers Ball 2k10 particpated in a exclusive private workshop with Donnie

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Road Trip True Steppers Connection - Donnie Davis Birthday Bash
